content.question: Which expression is equal to the magnitude of the magnetic field at Point <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end subscript, times I, and denominator pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 mu sub 0, end subscript, times I, and denominator 3 pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 mu sub 0, end subscript, times I, and denominator 3 pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 mu sub 0, end subscript, times I, and denominator 3 pi d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
